modName: Revert Unnecessary Changes Patch for USKP
summary: This little patch reverts the unnecessary changes USKP introduced (fortify potions for all magic class and shouts, aspect of terror for destruction, elemental fury for dual wielders, etc.)
descriptionHtml: This little mod reverts the unnecessary changes USKP introduced (fortify potions for all magic class and shouts, aspect of terror for destruction, elemental fury for dual wielders, etc.)
author: smjn

files.name: Revert Unnessecary Changes Patch for USKP
